function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate management of health risks, injuries, diseases, disabilities, psychological problems, and deaths in pandemics","Impact":"Long-term imbalances in societies and communities, loss of human lives, livelihood issues, and psycho-social problems","Mitigation":"Developing robust public health strategies, increasing healthcare capacity, and providing mental health support","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, telemedicine, and mental health apps","People":"General public, communities, and societies","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemics on human life and the global economy","Impact":"Disruption of human life, economic instability, job loss, and global economic peril","Mitigation":"Implementing public health measures, supporting affected businesses, and providing financial aid to individuals","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, economic stimulus programs, and remote work technologies","People":"Global population, businesses, and economies","Owner":"International organizations, government agencies, and financial institutions"}]}
